caption.title: Effect of mixing on the relative contribution of horizontal (W H) and vertical transmission (W V) to the fitness of the virulent λcI857.
caption.p:
More mixing (from
undisturbed, 30s, 24h to
24h-wet ) increases the fitness contribution of horizontal transmission to the competitive ability of λcI857 (W H) relative to the fitness contribution of vertical transmission (W V) (see Fig 3). Each box represents the median, the first and the third quartiles. Dashed lines delimit 1.5 times the inter-quartile range, above which individual counts are considered outliers and marked as empty circles.
